overall_assessment_notes.description: Overall assessment notes of the structured data provided. A concise summary of your findings, highlighting key strengths and weaknesses.

URL.description: URL of the website being reviewed.

subsector.description: Subsector of the data being reviewed.

relevance_score.description: Relevance score of the data. Explain briefly, referencing specific aspects of the data and target country.

credibility_score.description: Credibility score of the data. Explain briefly, referencing specific sources or document types.

completeness_score.description: Completeness score of the data. Explain briefly regarding the structured data fields and their content.

action_reasoning.description: Reasoning for the suggested action. Provide a concise justification. If 'deep_dive', specify what needs further investigation or re-extraction (e.g., 'Re-extract tables from document X focusing on energy sector emissions for 2020-2022').

refinement_details.description: Details for refinement if action is 'deep_dive'. For example, 'Re-extract tables from document URL focusing on energy sector emissions for 2020-2022'. If action is 'reject' and plan needs changes, suggest e.g. 'Refine search plan: Focus search on national statistical office website for {target_country_name} using keywords for National Inventory Report'.
